content:
Use the Build Your Own Promotion template to create promotion rules based on cart, product, customer, and custom cart attributes. The template enables discounts on carts, line items, unit prices, and combos, along with rewards such as vouchers, badges, and games.

With the new template, brands can create multifaceted promotion rules and criteria that span across cart configuration, customer attributes, and product attributes. Marketing managers can add criteria based on custom cart attributes like payment method.

Promotion rules can now contain a product attribute-based criterion that filters a customer's cart based on whether the cart contains products with matching attributes.

Marketing managers can create pricing rules without qualification criteria, so customer carts eligible for a promotion are automatically eligible for the promotion's rules.

Admins can assign users with permission sets to create and manage promotions. 

Provide Uninterrupted Member Services with Negative Points Balance.
Replicate Seasonal and Repetitive Promotions with Minimal Effort.
Streamline Program Manager Onboarding.
Increase Your Loyalty Program's Appeal by Partnering with More Brands.
Quickly Find Vouchers and Badges When You Design Promotion Setup Rules.
title: Global Promotions Management in Salesforce
